ContactCustomFieldType.description: Type can be one of 0- None, 1-Text, 2-Email, 3-Link, 4-SingleOptions, 5-MultiOptions, 6-Numeric, 7-Date

type.description: Type can be one of Text, SingleOption, MultiOptions, Numeric, Date, ExtendedText, ContactLookup
